name: Runic Ruins
description:
Introduction:
Runic Ruins is a time attack game where the player must
find and activate runes to extend the timer and collect
more points. The rune that needs to be pressed appears
in the top right of the screen. If you get stuck go in
the direction of the glowing pillar in the central room.


Contact:
Found a bug, have an idea, or just need to talk to me?
Shoot me an email at btpprograms@gmail.com or message me
on Twitter @BtpPrograms and I'll get back to you ASAP.

Credits:
Game made using the Libgdx framework
Art Assets made by BtpPrograms and FutilRevenge
Programming by BtpPrograms
Digital-7 Font by Sizenko Alexander: http://www.styleseven.com
